page.title: 10Vandalism & Graffiti
page.content: In the surrounding area there is a lot of Graffiti and vandalism.The graffiti appears on bus stop walls,Toilet walls and warehouses.Graffitiis done by chalk ,paint and spray paint.Young teenagers and even 12 year olds write on the walls because they are bored or it makes them look big.I don't think enough happens to them in the way of punishment if they get caught.Quite recently the scout hut in Cranbrook was set alight and a new one has had to be built.In the Cranbrook toilets,sinks have been smashed and windows have been broken.Also glass has been smashed all over the roads. Many subjects are covered from abusive and rude comments,pop groups,football teams,messages,bad language,and a variety of drawings.
